score.comment: Used to highlight the score on live matches

video.comment: Used as a BG when a video is playing

title-soft.comment: Used on the header of results cards

title-brand.comment: Used on the header of Hotbets cards

overlay_soft.comment: Used for overlays on playing videos

title-highlight.comment: Used on the header of Mycombi cards

overlay_container.comment: Used for the BG of the betslip

tab-on.comment: Used to highlight an active tab

tab-off.comment: Used to highlight an inactive tab

tag-timer.comment: Used only for tags on live cards

toggle-on.comment: Used for toggle items when ON

tag-hotbet.comment: Used only for bet tags on cards

toggle-off.comment: Used for toggle items when OFF

input-error.comment: Used for input fields with an error

tag-markets.comment: Used only for prebet tags on cards

tag-timer_alt.comment: Used only for tags on live cards

toggle-on_alt.comment: Used for toggle items when ON with red Bg

selection-line.comment: Used only lines on match cards

toggle-off_alt.comment: Used for toggle items when OFF with red Bg

input-error_alt.comment: Used for input fields with an error on red Bg

separator-strong.comment: Used for separator elements on dark Bg

input-default_alt.comment: Used for input fields on red Bg

input-selected_alt.comment: Used for selected input fields on red Bg

separator-soft_alt.comment: Used for separator elements on red Bg

toggle-on-container.comment: Used for toggle items when ON

toggle-off-container.comment: Used for toggle items when OFF

toggle-on-container_alt.comment: Used for toggle items when ON with red Bg

toggle-off-container_alt.comment: Used for toggle items when OFF with red Bg

red-card.comment: Used for red cards during a match

yellow-card.comment: Used for yellow cards during a match

graph-up.comment: Used for showing up a graph going up

graph-down.comment: Used for showing up a graph going down

trend-low-alt.comment: Used to present negative data on Red Bg

trend-mid_alt.comment: Used to present average data on Red Bg

trend-high_alt.comment: Used to present positive data on Red Bg

trend-container.comment: Used for the Bg of an element containing data

trend-container_alt.comment: Used for the Bg of an element containing data on red Bg

soft_alt.comment: Basic Border for elements on red Bgs

error_alt.comment: Border informing on an error on red Bg

selected_alt.comment: Border for selected elements on red Bg

button-betting-on.comment: Border for betting buttons on Live card

info.comment: Used for buttons turning into banners

back-top.comment: Used for buttons grouped together on red Bg

filter-on.comment: Used for filtering actions when ON

ghost_alt.comment: Used for all subtle actions on red Bg

group_alt.comment: Used for buttons grouped together on red Bg

filter-off.comment: Used for filtering actions when OFF

primary_alt.comment: Used for all primary actions on red Bg

info_pressed.comment: Used for buttons turning into banners

tertiary_alt.comment: Used for all tertiary actions on red Bg

countdown_red.comment: Used for the countdown on buttons

info_selected.comment: Used for buttons turning into banners

secondary_alt.comment: Used for all secondary actions on red Bg

countdown_dark.comment: Used for the countdown on buttons

countdown_light.comment: Used for the countdown on buttons

back-top_pressed.comment: Used for buttons grouped together on red Bg

filter-on_pressed.comment: Used for filtering actions when ON

ghost_alt_pressed.comment: Used for all subtle actions on red Bg

filter-off_pressed.comment: Used for filtering actions when OFF

ghost_alt_selected.comment: Used for all subtle actions on red Bg

primary_alt_pressed.comment: Used for all primary actions on red Bg

primary_alt_selected.comment: Used for all primary actions on red Bg

tertiary_alt_pressed.comment: Used for all tertiary actions on red Bg

secondary_alt_pressed.comment: Used for all secondary actions on red Bg

tertiary_alt_selected.comment: Used for all tertiary actions on red Bg

secondary_alt_selected.comment: Used for all secondary actions on red Bg

cashout_alt.comment: Only used for Cashout CTAs on red Bg

cashout_alt_pressed.comment: Only used for Cashout CTAs on red Bg

cashout_alt_selected.comment: Only used for Cashout CTAs on red Bg

list.comment: Only for text inside grouped lists

primary.comment: Used on text for high contrast

warning.comment: Used on text for warning messages

negative.comment: Used on text for negative messages

positive.comment: Used on text for positive messages

tab-active.comment: When a tab element is active

information.comment: Used on text for informative messages

primary_alt.comment: Used on text that does not swap

warning_alt.comment: Used on text for warning messages

negative_alt.comment: Used on text for negative messages

positive_alt.comment: Used on text for positive messages

tab-inactive.comment: When a tab element is inactive

tertiary_alt.comment: Used on non-important text information on colored BG

primary_solid.comment: Used on text for high contrast

secondary_alt.comment: Used on non-critical text information on colored BG

tab-active_alt.comment: When a tab element is active on a red BG

information_alt.comment: Used on text for informative messages

tab-inactive_alt.comment: When a tab element is inactive on a red BG

primary_solid_alt.comment: Used on text for high contrast on colored Bg

betting-on.comment: Only for the text of betting buttons

live-score.comment: Only for text score during live match

betting-off.comment: Only for the text of betting buttons

betting-on-live.comment: Only for the text of Live betting buttons

betting-trend-up.comment: Only for the text of trending up betting buttons

betting-trend-down.comment: Only for the text of trending down betting buttons
